short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: N.O-T/MY-D/E.PA/R.T-ME-N/T. 2.9-C/3. Stupid fun extension that makes parts (<a>) of webpages look like 29c3 announcements

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: My first Chromium extension, it garbles urls so they look a bit like the stuff from the currently running 29th chaos communication congress.
